# secondaryRotationBehavior

**Instance Property**

The rotation behavior describing how an object rotates due to secondary input, for example two handed rotation.

## Declaration

```swift
var secondaryRotationBehavior: ManipulationComponent.Dynamics.RotationBehavior
```
title: secondaryRotationBehavior
